an9.33:1.9.pli: ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā namassamāno pañjaliko payirupāseyya.
an9.33:1.9.en: They’d say ‘Good!’ and bowing down, they’d pay homage with joined palms.
